verses.verse: אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim, These [be] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh which Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, unto all Israel בְּעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den; Jordan בַּמִּדְבָּ֡ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness בָּֽעֲרָבָה֩ <WH6160> ba-'a-ra-Vah in the plain מ֨וֹל <WH4136> Mol over against ס֜וּף <WH5489> suf the Red בֵּֽין־ <WH996> bein- between פָּארָ֧ן <WH6290> pa-Ran [sea] between Paran וּבֵֽין־ <WH996> u-vein- between תֹּ֛פֶל <WH8603> To-fel and Tophel וְלָבָ֥ן <WH3837> ve-la-Van and Laban וַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <WH2698> va-cha-tze-Rot and Hazeroth וְדִ֥י ve-Di זָהָֽב׃ <WH1774> za-Hav. and Dizahab

אַחַ֨ד <WH259> 'a-Chad a עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten יוֹם֙ <WH3117> yOm days' מֵֽחֹרֵ֔ב <WH2722> me-cho-Rev, [journey] from Horeb דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech by the way הַר־ <WH2022> har- of mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> se-'Ir; Seir עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad against קָדֵ֥שׁ ka-Desh בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <WH6947> bar-Ne-a'. to Kadesh-barnea

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become בְּאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> be-'ar-ba-'Im And it came to pass in the fortieth שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, year בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> be-'ash-tei- eleven עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh month בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh [that] Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> Ke-chol to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had given him in commandment יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh according unto all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem. about

אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei After הַכֹּת֗וֹ <WH5221> hak-ko-To, he had slain אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et סִיחֹן֙ <WH5511> si-Chon Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> be-chesh-Bon; in Heshbon וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> ve-'Et, ע֚וֹג <WH5747> og and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> yo-Shev which dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּרֹ֖ת <WH6252> be-'ash-ta-Rot at Astaroth בְּאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <WH154> be-'ed-Re-'i. in Edrei

בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver On this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> mo-'Av; of Moab הוֹאִ֣יל <WH2974> ho-'Il began מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses בֵּאֵ֛ר <WH874> be-'Er to declare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> hat-to-Rah this law הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> 'e-Lei-nu to us בְּחֹרֵ֣ב <WH2722> be-cho-Rev unto us in Horeb לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying רַב־ <WH7227> rav- long enough לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem שֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> She-vet Ye have dwelt בָּהָ֥ר <WH2022> ba-Har in this mount הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

פְּנ֣וּ׀ <WH6437> pe-Nu Turn וּסְע֣וּ <WH5265> u-se-'U you and take your journey לָכֶ֗ם la-Chem, וּבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> u-Vo-'u and go הַ֥ר <WH2022> har to the mount הָֽאֱמֹרִי֮ <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שְׁכֵנָיו֒ <WH7934> she-che-Nav and unto all [the places] nigh בָּעֲרָבָ֥ה <WH6160> ba-'a-ra-Vah thereunto in the plain בָהָ֛ר <WH2022> va-Har in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֥ה <WH8219> u-vash-she-fe-Lah and in the vale וּבַנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> u-van-Ne-gev and in the south וּבְח֣וֹף <WH2348> u-ve-Chof side הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> hai-Yam; and by the sea אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz to the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites וְהַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> ve-hal-le-va-Non, and unto Lebanon עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far הַנָּהָ֥ר <WH5104> han-na-Har river הַגָּדֹ֖ל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol unto the great נְהַר־ <WH5104> ne-har- the river פְּרָֽת׃ <WH6578> pe-Rat. Euphrates

רְאֵ֛ה <WH7200> re-'Eh Behold נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem before אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; the land בֹּ֚אוּ <WH935> Bo-'u you go וּרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> u-re-Shu in and possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' sware יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1> la-'a-Vo-tei-Chem unto your fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> u-le-ya-'a-Ko and Jacob לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, וּלְזַרְעָ֖ם <WH2233> u-le-zar-'Am unto them and to their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar And I spake אֲלֵכֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-le-Chem, to you בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> ba-'Et unto you at that time הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- I am not אוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> 'u-Chal I am not able לְבַדִּ֖י <WH905> le-vad-Di you myself alone שְׂאֵ֥ת <WH5375> se-'Et to bear אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God הִרְבָּ֣ה <WH7235> hir-Bah hath multiplied אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; וְהִנְּכֶ֣ם <WH2009> ve-hin-ne-Chem and behold הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, you and behold ye [are] this day כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <WH3556> ke-choch-Vei as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> la-Ro. for multitude

יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> Yah-weh (The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֽוֹתֵכֶ֗ם <WH1> a-vo-te-Chem, of your fathers יֹסֵ֧ף <WH3254> yo-Sef so many more as עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem and כָּכֶ֖ם ka-Chem אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef make you a thousand פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim; times וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> vi-va-Rech ye [are] and bless אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber you as he hath promised לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

אֵיכָ֥ה <WH349> 'ei-Chah How אֶשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> 'es-Sa can I myself alone bear לְבַדִּ֑י <WH905> le-vad-Di; alone טָרְחֲכֶ֥ם <WH2960> ta-re-cha-Chem your cumbrance וּמַֽשַּׂאֲכֶ֖ם <WH4853> u-mas-sa-'a-Chem and your burden וְרִֽיבְכֶֽם׃ <WH7379> ve-Ri-ve-Chem. adversary

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu Take לָ֠כֶם La-chem אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH582> 'a-na-Shim men חֲכָמִ֧ים <WH2450> cha-cha-Mim you wise וּנְבֹנִ֛ים <WH995> u-ne-vo-Nim and understanding וִידֻעִ֖ים <WH3045> vi-du-'Im and known לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7626> le-shiv-tei-Chem; among your tribes וַאֲשִׂימֵ֖ם <WH7760> va-'a-si-Mem and I will make בְּרָאשֵׁיכֶֽם׃ <WH7218> be-ra-shei-Chem. them rulers

וַֽתַּעֲנ֖וּ <WH6030> vat-ta-'a-Nu And ye answered אֹתִ֑י <WH853> 'o-Ti; וַתֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vat-To-me-Ru, me and said טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> tov- [is] good הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> had-da-Var The thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ta which thou hast spoken לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> la-'a-Sot. [for us] to do

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <WH3947> va-'ek-Kach So I took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei the chief שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <WH7626> shiv-tei-Chem, of your tribes אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim men חֲכָמִים֙ <WH2450> cha-cha-Mim wise וִֽידֻעִ֔ים <WH3045> vi-du-'Im, and known וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> va-'et-Ten and made אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> 'o-Tam רָאשִׁ֖ים <WH7218> ra-Shim them heads עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem; over שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> sa-Rei over you captains אֲלָפִ֜ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and captains מֵא֗וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot, over hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and captains חֲמִשִּׁים֙ <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim over fifties וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and captains עֲשָׂרֹ֔ת <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rot, over tens וְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <WH7860> ve-sho-te-Rim and officers לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH7626> le-shiv-tei-Chem. among your tribes

וָאֲצַוֶּה֙ <WH6680> va-'a-tzav-Veh And I charged אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֹׁ֣פְטֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8199> sho-fe-tei-Chem, your judges בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying שָׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> sha-Mo-a' Hear בֵּין־ <WH996> bein- between אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> 'a-chei-Chem [the causes] between your brethren וּשְׁפַטְתֶּ֣ם <WH8199> u-she-fat-Tem and judge צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek, righteously בֵּֽין־ <WH996> bein- between אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish between [every] man וּבֵין־ <WH996> u-vein- between אָחִ֖יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv and his brother וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between גֵּרֽוֹ׃ <WH1616> ge-Ro. and the stranger

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תַכִּ֨ירוּ <WH5234> tak-Ki-ru Ye shall not respect פָנִ֜ים <WH6440> fa-Nim persons בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> bam-mish-Pat, in judgment כַּקָּטֹ֤ן <WH6996> kak-ka-Ton the small כַּגָּדֹל֙ <WH1419> kag-ga-Dol as well as the great תִּשְׁמָע֔וּן <WH8085> tish-ma-'Un, [but] ye shall hear לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo shall not תָג֙וּרוּ֙ <WH1481> ta-Gu-ru ye shall not be afraid מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei- of the face אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, of man כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> ham-mish-Pat for the judgment לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> le-lo-Him [is] God's ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he וְהַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> ve-had-da-Var and the cause אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after יִקְשֶׁ֣ה <WH7185> yik-Sheh that is too hard מִכֶּ֔ם <WH4480> mik-Kem, is too תַּקְרִב֥וּן <WH7126> tak-ri-Vun for you bring אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me וּשְׁמַעְתִּֽיו׃ <WH8085> u-she-ma'-Tiv. [it] unto me and I will hear

וָאֲצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> va-'a-tzav-Veh And I commanded אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> ba-'Et you at that time הַהִ֑וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv; he אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim all the things אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> ta-'a-Sun. which ye should do

וַנִּסַּ֣ע <WH5265> van-nis-Sa' And when we departed מֵחֹרֵ֗ב <WH2722> me-cho-Rev, from Horeb וַנֵּ֡לֶךְ <WH1980> van-Ne-lech and went אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַמִּדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar wilderness הַגָּדוֹל֩ <WH1419> hag-ga-dOl all that great וְהַנּוֹרָ֨א <WH3372> ve-han-no-Ra and terrible הַה֜וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which רְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> re-'i-Tem, which ye saw דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech by the way הַ֣ר <WH2022> har of the mountain הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which צִוָּ֛ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God אֹתָ֑נוּ <WH853> 'o-Ta-nu; וַנָּבֹ֕א <WH935> van-na-Vo us and we came עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad against קָדֵ֥שׁ ka-Desh בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <WH6947> bar-Ne-a'. to Kadeshbarnea
